page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Web Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenance
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Databases
incidents.message: Start Time : 15/08/2022 17:34 UTC End Time : 15/08/2022 18:02 UTC Service impact : The impacted host is operational again. Root cause : An inconsistency in the network configuration on the server hosting the VM. Current status : Resolved

incidents.name: [FR][VoIP] - VoIP service degradation
incidents.message:
This incident has been resolved.

Tuesday, June 7th 2022, our interconnection with Orange switched over its backup during 10:05 -> 11:10, 11:15 -> 12:20, 15:50 -> 17:00 UTC+2. Hence some calls never reached their destination during those periods.
Some impacted clients attempting phone calls during those periods might have seemingly reached their target but may have experienced one-way or no audio.
incidents.timestamp: Jun <var data-var='date'>7</var>, <var data-var='time'>12:19</var> - Jun <var data-var='date'>13</var>, <var data-var='time'>09:15</var> UTC
